FuncDef: This command, creates a configuration context for the specified redirect policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the redirect policy name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, etc.), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. There is no limit to the number of redirect policies that can be configured.
This keyword is required to create the configuration context. Once it is created, the context can be enabled with or without the create keyword.
